Package aom.scripting.xs.tr

Class VictoryConditions

Object
VictoryConditions
public abstract class VictoryConditions
extends Object
This class provides a collection of Trigger commands concerning Victory Conditions (VCs).
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void vcCheckConquestVictory()
    Checks if a player has no more units marked with "LogicalTypeNeededForVictory".
    void vcCheckSettlementVictory​(int countdown)
    Checks if 1 team has claimed all town centers, and fires a counter with given duration.
    int vcGetGameplayMode()
    Returns the current gameplay modeID.
    void vcStartOrUpdateWonderTimer​(int player, string building, int countdown)
    Looks for wonder timers to start.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • vcCheckConquestVictory

      public void vcCheckConquestVictory()
      Checks if a player has no more units marked with "LogicalTypeNeededForVictory". If the result is true, that player will be set defeated.

    • vcCheckSettlementVictory

      public void vcCheckSettlementVictory​(int countdown)
      Checks if 1 team has claimed all town centers, and fires a counter with given duration. If the counter finishes, the opposite teams will be set defeated.
      Parameters:
      countdown - the duration of the countdown

    • vcStartOrUpdateWonderTimer

      public void vcStartOrUpdateWonderTimer​(int player, string building, int countdown)
      Looks for wonder timers to start.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to be checked for wonders.
      building - the protoname for a wonder ("wonder")
      countdown - the duration of the countdown
      Note
      The actual wonder countdown, etc. is handled in C code, this function's responsibility is just starting things up.

    • vcGetGameplayMode

      public int vcGetGameplayMode()
      Returns the current gameplay modeID.
